__e: The cages were in a basement, in a room that... wasn't that much bigger than this.
It's totally blind, but there's nothing to see underground anyway.
When you're underground in a confined space, the VC can smell anything on you: Your aftershave, cigarette smoke in your uniform. They can even tell what brand.
I think you're 10 feet underground... and I am the only living soul who knows where you are.
Five years ago you found me, underground... I would just think that after everything that's happened you would take what I say seriously.
Honestly, I was thinking about how far down we are and how it's not my favorite thing.
